text: He was writing the writing on the wall.

This is a green book. That's a smurfish smurfiator. 

After a while , there's a whole new paragraph. This one.
i srsly hate the stupid twitter API timeout thing, soooo annoying!!!!! :(

What is he whose grief
Bears such an emphasis, whose phrase of sorrow
Conjures the wandering stars, and makes them stand
Like wonder-wounded hearers? This is I,
Hamlet the Dane.
I want to market the stuff I want to sell on the market, using marketing.
